evidence.claim: GovShop utilizes AWS for cloud services.
GovShop complies with HIPAA regulations for health data.
The platform supports integration via API, allowing for seamless data exchange and interoperability.
GovShop processes EDI transactions in support of procurement activities.
GovShop employs FHIR standards for health data interoperability.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of handling X12 transactions or eligibility claims on the site.
